title: My Fiancé's Brother
description: The dramatic conclusion to the Guilty series!I just exposed my secret to the world. Now my carefully planned life is imploding, and I have no idea what to do next.This is a complete nightmare. There’s a really good chance Jackson will never talk to me again. Not that I’d blame him. I gave him the one thing he was adamant he didn’t want.And now that he’s left me, I’m left with so many questions and no one to ask. What is behind Jackson’s enigmatic walls? Why doesn’t he let anyone get too close? Will he ever tell me what treatment he was receiving at the hospital? Will I ever see him again? Or have I ruined things completely?I need to focus on my future, but how can I when the past is creating such havoc? Matt, Jackson and Irene are keeping so many secrets, and the more I dig, the more complicated things become. I want my happily ever after, and that requires a leap of faith. My only request?Please don’t crush my heart.
author: Odette Stone
